messageBody:
Hi

I'm trying to run JUnit4 from within eclipse (not ant!) with the
'fork' option available for ant as some of my tests must set some
global settings which cannot be undone.
Is there a -D...=... option to specify JUnit to create a new VM for
every test file?

Thanks

Matt
